results.text: RT @MplsFlannery: Goodbye @jrubyconf! http://t.co/dA6D0vVQ
Home sweet home! Thanks for a great week @JRubyConf !!!
RT @yokolet: My slide about pure java nokogiri is here http://t.co/eIzhJwJj . Enjoy the pictures  #jrubyconf
RT @ejgreenberg: Still thinking about @jrubyconf. So much fun with @mplsflannery, @nicksieger and @kelseyschimm et al. The Ruby Arms Race is ON, @jremsikjr.
RT @nicksieger: JRuby人 @banzaiman @nahi #jrubyconf  http://t.co/Z2Lx4LFW
@MplsFlannery @jrubyconf Cool! Gotta love the West Bank, especially now that we have @republicmn!
@bascule @JRubyConf we thought you might rock out in your hotel room!  Now you can karaoke at any hour of the day.
@marcusgpeterson @mplsflannery @jrubyconf I worked in the peer advisor office a few doors down from your office.  It was about 20 yrs. ago.

trying out my my new #jrubyconf glass http://t.co/Ppl2fsnM
@nicksieger Enjoyed it! Thank you very much Nick and @MplsFlannery, with your hard work I had great moment at JRubyConf. Have a good rest.
@qmx @JRubyConf #win for sure! Nice meeting you.
RT @SimplyMadeApps: Our very own @bmedenwald will be at JRubyConf Minneapolis today thru Wed. If you'd like to talk about Simple In/Out, message him on Twitter.
RT @qmx: at DFW waiting my last flight back home - thanks @JRubyConf for yielding so many unforgettable happy moments #win
@qmx Hope had a safe flight and you get better. Nice to meeting with you at JRubyConf! Hope we can meet again within a few years.
@bascule Nice to talking with you at #JRubyConf. Hope we get something go forward :)
Whisky tasting @JRubyConf inspired me to develop a taste for scotch. So here I go! #jrubyconf http://t.co/rf2Pp6jP
@tomtoday You are very kind. I was terrified. Thanks for being part of a stellar group.  cc: @nicksieger @JRubyConf
at DFW waiting my last flight back home - thanks @JRubyConf for yielding so many unforgettable happy moments #win

Still thinking about @jrubyconf. So much fun with @mplsflannery, @nicksieger and @kelseyschimm et al. The Ruby Arms Race is ON, @jremsikjr.
About to leave Minneapolis. Had a great time. Thanks for such great hospitality and a great conference @mplsflannery @nicksieger @JRubyConf
If any @JRubyConf folks are still in Minneapolis and awake I will be at the Walker Art Center in 30 minutes. It's free!
Pretty good haul from #jrubyconf. Some bought, some left over :) http://t.co/PKpgLtOM
@kelseyschimm @nicksieger @ejgreenberg @JRubyConf And thank YOU!  The thunderstorm was your departure gift.

Really enjoyed @JRubyConf A nice mix of fun hardcore tech, and perspectives on keeping our careers and relationships vibrant.

.@nicksieger, best conf ever.  I really wish to contribute; how could a .Net/C#-er like me start to give to JRuby? #Jrubyconf inspired me.
RT @yokolet: @nicksieger @MplsFlannery It was awesome @JRubyConf! Thanks for your hard work. Also, I thank people worked previous JRuby confs. Keep going
I'm inspired by @bascule's talk on Celluloid and DCell at #jrubyconf to write a roflscaled distributed Fibonacci computing network.
RT @headius: I'm always a little sad when a great conf is over, but doubly so after #jrubyconf. Thanks everyone for the best conf ever.
